btech.title: B.Tech Programs
btech.description: NIT Raipur offers Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) programs across 11 engineering disciplines and 1 architecture program. These programs are designed to develop strong technical foundations, problem-solving abilities, and industry-ready skills.

branches.name: Computer Science & Engineering
branches.vision: To produce ethically strong, highly competent professionals in Computer Science and Engineering for serving the society.
branches.mission: To impart quality education, promote research and innovation, and develop leadership qualities through a robust curriculum.
branches.description: Focuses on software development, algorithms, data structures, AI, machine learning, and computer networks.

branches.name: Information Technology
branches.vision: To excel in information technology education and research for human development.
branches.mission: To provide quality technical education and develop professionals with strong ethics.
branches.description: Focuses on software engineering, web technologies, information security, and cloud computing.

branches.name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
branches.vision: To be a leader in providing quality education and research in the field of Electronics and Communication Engineering.
branches.mission: To create an environment for students to acquire technical skills and research capabilities to solve global challenges.
branches.description: Covers analog and digital electronics, communication systems, signal processing, VLSI design, and embedded systems.

branches.name: Electrical Engineering
branches.vision: To produce globally competent electrical engineers capable of adapting to the changing needs of industry and society.
branches.mission: To provide quality education in Electrical Engineering with emphasis on professional ethics and research.
branches.description: Covers power systems, electrical machines, control systems, power electronics, and renewable energy technologies.

branches.name: Mechanical Engineering
branches.vision: To be recognized as a center of excellence in Mechanical Engineering education and research.
branches.mission: To provide state-of-the-art education and research environment in Mechanical Engineering and allied areas.
branches.description: Focuses on thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, manufacturing processes, machine design, and automobile engineering.

branches.name: Civil Engineering
branches.vision: To produce civil engineers of international standard who can contribute to infrastructure development.
branches.mission: To promote excellence in civil engineering education and research through collaborative learning.
branches.description: Covers structural engineering, geotechnical engineering, transportation, water resources, and environmental engineering.

branches.name: Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
branches.vision: To emerge as a premier center for metallurgical and materials science education.
branches.mission: To foster innovation in material development and sustainable extraction processes.
branches.description: Focuses on material science, extractive metallurgy, physical metallurgy, and advanced materials.

branches.name: Mining Engineering
branches.vision: To be a leading department for providing skilled mining engineers for sustainable mineral development.
branches.mission: To provide high-quality education and conduct research in mining and allied areas.
branches.description: Covers mine planning, rock mechanics, mineral processing, and mine safety.

branches.name: Chemical Engineering
branches.vision: To be a center of excellence for education and research in Chemical Engineering.
branches.mission: To provide a conducive atmosphere for students to excel in technical knowledge and research.
branches.description: Covers chemical process engineering, reaction engineering, process control, and environmental engineering.

branches.name: Biomedical Engineering
branches.vision: To integrate engineering with life sciences for the betterment of healthcare.
branches.mission: To develop skilled professionals capable of designing advanced medical instrumentation.
branches.description: Combines engineering with medical sciences covering medical imaging, biomechanics, and clinical engineering.

branches.name: Biotechnology
branches.vision: To be a sound center for education and research in field of Biotechnology in India.
branches.mission: To provide adequate and scientific education in Biotechnology and prepare students for innovative careers.
branches.description: Covers genetic engineering, bioprocess technology, molecular biology, and bioinformatics.

branches.name: Architecture
branches.vision: To create professionals with a sensitivity toward the environment and architectural aesthetics.
branches.mission: To promote excellence in architecture and planning through a blend of tradition and modernity.
branches.description: The B.Arch program develops skills in architectural design and urban planning over a 5-year duration.

mtech.title: M.Tech Programs
mtech.description: Master of Technology (M.Tech) programs provide advanced specialization in engineering. The degrees are offered by respective departments (Civil, Electrical, Mech, etc.) focusing on specific domains.

branches.name: Information Technology
branches.vision: To produce competent professionals with specialized knowledge in IT.
branches.mission: To impart quality technical education and promote research.
branches.description: Offered by IT Dept. Advanced study in software engineering, distributed systems, and network security.

branches.name: VLSI Design & Embedded Systems
branches.vision: To lead in VLSI education and research.
branches.mission: To create skilled professionals in semiconductor technology.
branches.description: Offered by ECE Dept. Specialization in IC design, FPGA implementation, and embedded system architectures.

branches.name: Power System & Power Electronics
branches.vision: To excel in power engineering education.
branches.mission: To research advanced control techniques for modern power grids.
branches.description: Offered by Electrical Dept. Advanced study of power system stability, control systems, and smart grids.

branches.name: Structural Engineering
branches.vision: To be a centre of excellence in structural engineering.
branches.mission: To provide advanced knowledge in analysis and design of structures.
branches.description: Offered by Civil Dept. Focuses on advanced structural analysis, earthquake engineering, and concrete technology.

branches.name: Water Resources Dev. & Irrigation
branches.vision: To address global water challenges through engineering solutions.
branches.mission: To train professionals in sustainable water resource management.
branches.description: Offered by Civil Dept. Covers hydrology, irrigation engineering, and fluid mechanics.

branches.name: Thermal Engineering
branches.vision: To advance knowledge in thermal sciences.
branches.mission: To develop efficient energy systems and thermal solutions.
branches.description: Offered by Mechanical Dept. Specialization in thermodynamics, heat transfer, and energy conversion.

branches.name: Machine Design
branches.vision: To foster innovation in mechanical design.
branches.mission: To create experts in CAD/CAM and mechanical system design.
branches.description: Offered by Mechanical Dept. Focuses on solid mechanics, vibration, and advanced machine design.

branches.name: Industrial Engineering & Management
branches.vision: To optimize industrial processes and management.
branches.mission: To integrate engineering with management principles.
branches.description: Offered by Mechanical Dept. Study of operations research, supply chain management, and quality control.

branches.name: Energy & Environment
branches.vision: To provide solutions for energy crisis and environmental protection.
branches.mission: To research renewable energy and pollution control technologies.
branches.description: Offered by Chemical Engg Dept. Interdisciplinary program covering renewable energy, waste management, and environmental impact.

branches.name: Applied Geology
branches.vision: To promote the sustainable development and conservation of mineral and natural resources.
branches.mission: To promote Human Resource Development in achieving goals of sustainable development and conservation of natural resources.
branches.description: A 3-year specialized program in structural geology, mineralogy, and mineral exploration.

branches.name: Urban Planning
branches.vision: To create sustainable and resilient urban environments.
branches.mission: To impart knowledge in urban planning, policy, and management.
branches.description: Offered by Architecture Dept. Focuses on town planning, smart cities, and sustainable urban development.

msc.title: M.Sc Programs
msc.description: Master of Science programs offer advanced theoretical knowledge and research in fundamental and applied sciences.

branches.name: Physics
branches.vision: To provide quality scientific and technical education, training, innovation and creativity in Pure and Applied Physics.
branches.mission: To contribute towards the country through excellence in scientific education and research.
branches.description: Advanced study in quantum mechanics, solid state physics, and nuclear physics.

branches.name: Chemistry
branches.vision: To provide a platform of nationally recognized model of education to compete in a technology-centered world.
branches.mission: To nurture students by providing quality education in classroom teaching, laboratories, and research.
branches.description: Covers organic, inorganic, physical, and analytical chemistry.

branches.name: Mathematics
branches.vision: To emerge as a center of excellence in mathematical sciences and its applications.
branches.mission: To promote excellence in mathematical education and research.
branches.description: Study of pure and applied mathematics including algebra and numerical methods.

phd.title: Ph.D Programs
phd.description: Doctoral programs are offered across Engineering, Science, Management, and Humanities departments.

branches.name: Humanities & Social Sciences
branches.vision: To render world class professionals efficient in communicative, managerial and entrepreneurial skills.
branches.mission: To develop an immersive learning and innovative environment and state-of-art interdisciplinary research.
branches.description: Research in English literature, Linguistics, Sociology, and Management.

branches.name: Engineering & Science Departments
branches.vision: To promote innovation and high-quality research in engineering and sciences.
branches.mission: To produce researchers who can solve technical problems of society.
branches.description: Ph.D opportunities in all major engineering branches, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.

mca.title: MCA Program
mca.description: The Master of Computer Applications program focuses on high-level software development and IT management.

branches.name: Master of Computer Applications
branches.vision: To provide best possible education that would help in developing students with strong technical backgrounds.
branches.mission: To impart quality education to meet the needs of professional societies and the nation.
branches.description: Covers data structures, cloud computing, AI/ML, and network security. Admission via NIMCET.
